thread.section_title: Homestay.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homestay.com | homestay.com
thread.title: John

author: John
title: John
text: Homestay needs to be accurate in detailing the payment option(s) regarding individual owners. In my case, it was insinuated that, after making the deposit, the balance would be due sometime before my arrival date. However, the owner advised me that she requires the balance immediately. While this did not present a problem, the exact nature of the transaction was not descried accurately by Homestay.
